entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
